2097040.name: 1428: Shadows over Silesia - Soundtrack
2097040.description:
Listen to the soundtrack, which contains most of the in-game music from 1428: Shadows over Silesia. The tracks were composed by a trio of composers - Dark Fantasy Studio, Matyas Vonz and Jan Valta. Some of the tracks are originally composed for the game. For example, God Warriors is a variation on the medieval Hussite chant "Ye Who Are Warriors of God".

This soundtrack contains 41 mp3 files, subdivided into two discs.

TOTAL TIME: 1 hour, 31 minutes, 06 seconds
﻿
